400.message: The server cannot process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.

401.message: The requested resource requires an authentication.

403.message: The requested resource requires an authentication.

404.message: The requested resource could not be found but may be available again in the future.

501.message: The Webserver cannot recognize the request method.

502.message:
We've got some trouble with our backend upstream cluster.
Our service team has been dispatched to bring it back online.

503.message:
We've got some trouble with our backend upstream cluster.
Our service team has been dispatched to bring it back online.
